title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Publish Tiddler
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/readme","text":"* Publish Tiddler Manager * not save storylist to html * support Publish or not manager !! NOTE * 在第一次启动时, 控制台可能会多出很多 `syncer-browser-tiddlyweb: Checking dirty status` 类似与这样的日志 !! TODO * add plugin work details with tiddlywiki * enable only dev * maybe should use stattiddler to use http * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler]] * [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw/main]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/filter","text":"[!is[system]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/filter","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish-filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish-filter","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define publishFilter() -[[$:/StoryList]] -[all[tiddlers+shadows]!is[system]!has[draft.of]field:publish[no]] -[tag[private]] -[tag[todo]] -[tag[Journal]] -[tag[books]] \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":" \define opublish() <$checkbox tiddler=<> field="publish" checked=no unchecked=yes> dont publish this tiddler <$list filter={{{ [get[publish]match[no]] }}}> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon}} <$list filter={{{ [get[publish]match[yes]] }}}> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/filter}} \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/publish-config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/publish-config","text":"\define tidFilter() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/filter
filter: <$edit-text tiddler=<> placeholder="[!is[system]]" tag="input" default="" />
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/style","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/template":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/template","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"<$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]!is[draft]subfilter{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/filter}]">
<>
"}}}
